configuration required if access keys en: Configuration is only required if the instance has access keys enabled, keep it off if you don't know the situation
enter rsshub domain: Please enter your RSSHub domain name, leave it blank to use the official domain name
for more rules join us: For more rules support, join us！
join rsshub: Participate in the <a href="https://docs.rsshub.app/en/"> to make everything RSS-able!
required access key: Obrigatório, por favor insira a chave de acesso correta
required address: Obrigatório. Por favor insira o seu endereço de %{service}
requires reader support: Requer suporte a leitor, tais como Reeder, etc.
rsshub radar info: RSSHub Radar is a spin-off of RSSHub that helps you quickly discover and subscribe to RSS and RSSHub for your current site, and the project is open source under the MIT license and is completely free to use, but as the project grows in size, it also needs to be funded to sustain its maintenance and development
sponsored development: Desenvolvimento patrocinado do RSSHub Radar: https://docs.rsshub.app/en/support/
